text.name: LIMIT_REACHED_WOOD
text.text: You can't sell any more Wood. Daily sell limit reached.

text.name: LIMIT_REACHED_MISSION
text.text: You can't accept another Mission. Daily sell limit reached.

text.name: LIMIT_REACHED_FRUIT
text.text: You can't sell any more yield. Daily sell limit reached.

text.name: LIMIT_REACHED_ANIMAL
text.text: You can't sell any more Animals. Daily sell limit reached.
